name: Hoser Backgammon
overview: Hoser Backgammon is an simple Amiga Shareware version of the classic board game of the same name. It can only be played against the AI and is controlled with the mouse: to move a checker, click on it with the left mouse button, then click on the spike that you want to move the checker. If a move is invalid, an error message will be displayed in the menu stripe.
